title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 312.5 - Transportation of gas of others-distribution facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 312.5 - Transportation of gas of others-distribution facilities

State Regulations

Revenues from transporting gas to the utility's customers
through the distribution facilities of the utility where the gas is provided by
a party other than the utility shall be included in account 489.3, transportation of gas of others - distribution facilities. Subsidiary accounts
shall be maintained to break down these revenues according to the
classification of accounts under the sales of electricity revenue accounts. Records shall be maintained so that the quantity of gas transported and the
revenue received under each rate schedule shall be readily available. Notes

York State Register December 9, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 49, eff. 11/24/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
